programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.(n)

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.(n)

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.(n)

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..(n)

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..(n)

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.(n)

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.(n)

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.(n)

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.(n)

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.(n)

programme.desc: Valerie invites photographer Brian Bowen Smith over for a menu inspired by his favorite ingredient, tequila. Tequila lime chicken wings, chayote slaw, chile lime party mix, a mango tart and mango tequila sunrise are served.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond makes dinner in miniature for a fun get-together with her niece. She prepares all of niece Halle's favorites, like adorable Bacon Cheeseburger Bites with little Loaded Crash Hots and charming Waldorf Salad Skewers.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond shares the fundamentals of creating care packages while putting one together for Alex. Lemon raspberry pound cake, snickerdoodles, brown butter granola clusters, strawberry fruit roll-ups and custom-made hot chocolate mix gets wrapped up.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond has a line-up of the best bits of food with a stuffed pizza crust and arrabiata sauce, orange blueberry muffin tops, 'a little fruit with my crisp' and crispy chicken skins for a CLT salad with simple ranch dressing.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: The whole family gathers in town for Sunday lunch at Ree's in-law's. Ladd's dad grills chicken a la Chuck while everyone is at church and Ree brings deviled bacon and eggs, pork lover's baked beans and country-style peach slab pie to feed a crowd.(n)

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is making a Mexican food vacation for her husband, Nick, with all his favorites. She cooks up a decadent refried beans and rice bowl, roasted salmon tacos wrapped in chewy homemade flour tortillas.(n)

programme.title: Trisha's Southern Kitchen
programme.desc: Trisha Yearwood is revisiting her most-comforting and crowd-pleasing Southern recipes, including Country Ham Biscuits and Scallion-Pimento Cheese, Pete's Catfish, Fried Green Tomatoes and her family's special recipe for Eboo's Wild Scuppernong Pie.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa: Back to Basics
programme.desc: Ina Garten is serving up her top picks for comforting, easy dinners, plus a new aperitif. There's Rigatoni with Sausage and Fennel, Roast Chicken Cobb Salad, Spring Green Risotto and a refreshing California Ice Tea.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa: Back to Basics
programme.desc: Ina Garten is sharing all her secrets and pro tips for Italian dishes. She starts with a fabulous two-fer, tomato eggplant soup, and the leftovers become baked pasta with tomatoes and eggplant.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: '48 Hours' takes a fresh look at a very cold case; a double homicide that captured the attention of the nation in 1892, when Lizzie Borden was acquitted of killing her father and stepmother with a hatchet.

programme.desc: On her way home from a Girl Scouts Halloween party, 11-year-old Shauna Howe mysteriously disappeared. When her body was found two days later, Halloween in this small town was canceled and an all-out hunt for her killer began.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Nearly three decades after a woman was shot in her Palm Beach County, Fla., home by someone wearing a clown costume, two people who were there describe what they saw in this interview.

programme.title: Horror at the Cecil Hotel
programme.desc: A tourist checks into a hotel and becomes the latest in a long line of strange cases.

programme.title: Horror at the Cecil Hotel
programme.desc: L.A.'s infamous Cecil Hotel has seen its fair share of death. But few know it housed some of the most violent killers. While staying at The Cecil, one intrepid journalist is hot on the trail of L.A.'s latest murderer, resident Richard Ramirez.

programme.title: Horror at the Cecil Hotel
programme.desc: One of the lesser known deaths at L.A.'s notorious Cecil Hotel involves an older man and younger woman, found lying in blood on the sidewalk outside. To investigators, it seems like both fell from a ninth-floor window. Or were they pushed.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: In 2012, hikers in Los Angeles' Hollywood Hills discover the severed head of Hervey Medellin, a retired flight clerk. The cast of suspects includes former lovers, drug cartels and a murderous porn star, in a tale of lust, greed and butchery.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: Just before Thanksgiving in Oklahoma City, a husband and wife are at home when two masked gunmen allegedly ambush them and kill the husband. With few leads, police use ballistics, forensics and neighborhood gossip to solve this cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: In the 1970s a serial rapist is on the loose in northern California. And just as his reign of terror over the community wanes, police discover he isn't just a serial rapist, he's a serial murderer and he's been killing people all over California.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A lone survivor is the only witness who can help police track down a serial killer known as the Grim Sleeper, who preys on women in South Central Los Angeles. After decades of searching, police hone in on an unlikely suspect.

programme.title: The Green River Killer: Mind of a Monster
programme.desc: Victims of The Green River Killer are still being found today. Now, with access to hundreds of hours of unseen police footage, we will reveal the shocking truth behind one of America's most prolific serial killers.

programme.title: The Green River Killer: Mind of a Monster
programme.desc: Victims of The Green River Killer are still being found today. Now, with access to hundreds of hours of unseen police footage, we will reveal the shocking truth behind one of America's most prolific serial killers.

programme.title: BTK: Chasing a Serial Killer
programme.desc: BTK announces his arrival by murdering four members of the same family. He claims more victims over several years while taunting police, then goes dark for two decades before resurfacing in 2004 after media stories claim that he'd been forgotten.

programme.title: BTK: Chasing a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A new generation of law enforcement hunts the resurgent BTK, who delights in communicating with police and the media about his murders while threatening new ones. He is finally arrested, bringing relief to Wichita but shock and horror to his family.

programme.title: BTK: Chasing a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Dennis Rader, aka BTK, confesses to ten murders and points police to the disturbing hoard of evidence against him. The depth of his depravity is revealed, along with the lasting effect he had on those in his orbit, most especially his own daughter.

programme.title: The Butcher Baker: Mind of a Monster
programme.desc: In the 1980s, a mild-mannered family man ran a bakery in Anchorage, Alaska. Unknown to those who knew him, he also hunted and murdered dozens of women. In a world exclusive, we see inside the warped mind of Robert Hansen with his final taped confession.

programme.title: Bloody Mary's

programme.title: Redrum
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn and his family are driving to a water park when their lives are tragically ended in a roadside shooting. Chris is wounded but survives. As investigators unravel the truth, they find that not everyone in this family was a happy camper.

programme.title: Redrum

programme.desc: In West Bloomfield, Michigan, a simple affair between two coworkers turns complex as the two lovers are willing to do anything...even commit murder... to protect their darkest secret.(n)
